welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Roosevelt, where the charm of small-town America meets stunning natural beauty. Get ready to experience the birthplace of the teddy bear and immerse yourself in our picturesque surroundings. Enjoy your stay and discover all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is one of the largest international terminals in the United States.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal is mainly used by JetBlue and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by British Airways and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines, with a focus on American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines, Southwest Airlines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by JetBlue Airways.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves as the hub for all major airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport is primarily used for regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Fixed Base Operator Terminal
terminals.description: The FBO terminal at Teterboro Airport is used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
